title: Blog
text:
from pathlib import Path
import frontmatter

posts = []
for p in sorted(Path('.').rglob('*.qmd')):
  if p.name == 'index.qmd':
    continue
  meta = frontmatter.load(p)
  title = meta.get('title', p.stem)
  date = meta.get('date', '')
  url = '/' + str(p.with_suffix('.html')).lstrip('./')
  posts.append((date, title, url))

posts.sort(reverse=True)

for date, title, url in posts:
  print(f"- [{title}]({url}) — {date}")

- [Welcome](/2025/09/0_welcome.html) — 2025-09-18
